      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setAllowedCharacterPattern(Pattern allowedCharacterPattern)
      Sets the pattern used to determine which typed characters can be entered into the field.

      Sets the background color of non-caret characters.

      Enables or disables use of the backspace key.

      Sets the background color of the caret.

      Sets the foreground color of the caret.

      Enables or disables use of the delete key.

      Enables or disables use of the down arrow key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setEndKeyEnabled(boolean endKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the end key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setEnterKeyEnabled(boolean enterKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the enter key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setForegroundColor(Color foregroundColor)
      Sets the foreground color of non-caret characters.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the text field, in characters.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setHomeKeyEnabled(boolean homeKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the home key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setLeftArrowKeyEnabled(boolean leftArrowKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the left arrow key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setMaxHorizontalCharacters(int maxHorizontalCharacters)
      Sets the maximum amount of characters that the text area can contain on the x-axis.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setMaxVerticalCharacters(int maxVerticalCharacters)
      Sets the maximum amount of characters that the text area can contain on the y-axis.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setRightArrowKeyEnabled(boolean rightArrowKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the right arrow key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setUpArrowKeyEnabled(boolean upArrowKeyEnabled)
      Enables or disables use of the up arrow key.
      TextAreaBuilder TextAreaBuilder.setWidth(int width)
      Sets the width of the text field, in characters.
